short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Takes notes and stick them to webpages or websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Net notes allows you to take notes online. They stay attached to the website or webpage you're on, easy to access whenever you visit. You can also see them all at once.

The app will notify you if you visit a page with a note already stuck to it (subject to the notifications settings / your device).
